hints.content: When we skip count by tens,  we add $10$ to each number as we count.

Randall started with $783$,  so we need to add $10$ more to $783$.

$783 + 10 = 793$

The next number Randall will say is $793$.

Randall is still skip counting by ten so we need to add $10$ to $793$.

$793 + 10 = 803$

The next number Randall will say is $803$.

question.content:
Randall starts counting at $783$. He counts by tens.

**What two numbers does Randall count next?**
